thread.title: Great but don't take too much luggage
thread.title_full: Great but don't take too much luggage - Review of Hyatt Herald Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DiscerningDC
title: Great but don't take too much luggage
text: Even by NY's tiny room standards, this is a little cramped. I found the check in location a little confusing as well - through the back, on the right, next to the restaurant, with little signage to indicate that was the check in area. That said, I really enjoyed staying here - the staff are friendly, the rooms somehow work and the food is very good. It's one of those "i quite like it, but I'm not sure why' type places. I'll be back though.
